short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a barcode to scan on your Canada Post mobile app when viewing the tracking page on the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When viewing Canada Post tracking page, there's no barcode to scan with your mobile app (to track your packages), so this extension generates a barcode on the Canada Post tracking page for you to scan with the Canada Post app!
